---
lang: "en"
title: "Bookdown test"
subtitle: "subtitle goes here"
author: "Jack Dougherty and contributors"
twitter-handle: doughertyjack
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
knit: "bookdown::render_book"
site: bookdown::bookdown_site
documentclass: book
bibliography: book.bib
biblio-style: authortitle
citation-style: chicago-fullnote-bibliography.csl
link-citations: true

url: 'http\://ontheline.github.io/'
github-repo: ontheline/ontheline.github.io
description: ' "On The Line" describes how... (add for SEO, with no HTML)'
cover-image: "images/otl-cover-600x600.png"

output:
  bookdown::gitbook:
    dev: svglite
    css: css/style.css
    split_by: rmd
    number_sections: true
    config:
      toc:
        scroll_highlight: yes
        collapse: section
        before: |
            <li><strong><a href="./">On the Line</a></strong></li>
        after: |
            <li><a href="https://bookdown.org" target="_blank">Published with bookdown</a></li>
      download: [pdf, epub, mobi]
      edit:
        link: https://github.com/ontheline/ontheline.github.io/edit/master/%s
        text: "Edit on GitHub"
      search: yes
      sharing:
        facebook: yes
        github: yes
        twitter: yes
      includes:
        after_body: google-analytics-otl.html

  bookdown::pdf_book: default

  bookdown::epub_book:
    dev: svglite
    stylesheet: css/style.css
---
